meanings.sent1: The old, torn shirt was unworthier than the new one.
meanings.sent2: She felt unworthier of the award after making a mistake.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the empty box was unworthier than the full one.
meanings.sent4: His unworthier behavior made him stand out among his peers.
meanings.sent5: The wilted flowers looked even unworthier in the bright sunlight.

meanings.definition: Less deserving or worthy than someone or something else
meanings.sent1: The smaller cake seemed unworthier next to the giant one.
meanings.sent2: He felt unworthier of the promotion than his hardworking colleague.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's unworthier attempts at catching the ball were adorable.
meanings.sent4: Her unworthier skills in painting were evident in the comparison.
meanings.sent5: The old, rusty bike appeared even unworthier beside the shiny new one.
